World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 16 日星期五 14:34:54 GMT 120
Yulia Navalnaya: Putin will not go unpunished for husband's deathRussian President Vladimir Putin and his associates will not go unpunished if the death of Alexei Navalny, as reported by Russian officials, turns out to be true, the Kremlin critic's wife, Yulia, said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 14:27:56 GMT 4VPKK4IGJFIUZAJEHG3BA5YICA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yulia-navalnaya-putin-will-not-go-unpunished-husbands-death-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Hezbollah says Israel will pay 'in blood' for killing civiliansThe Iran-backed Hezbollah signalled on Friday it would escalate attacks on Israel in response to the deaths of 10 Lebanese civilians killed in Israeli attacks this week, saying Israel would pay a price "in blood". Fri, 16 Feb 2024 14:25:55 GMT SYTGNFSONFPJZGIN74LZAKN37A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-says-israel-will-pay-in-blood-killing-civilians-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东地区
Blinken to visit Brazil, Argentina for meetings with Lula, MileiU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will travel next week to Brazil and Argentina, where he is set to meet with both countries' leaders to discuss "bilateral and global issues," the State Department said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 14:19:03 GMT AJN2PN632ZJLHGU5ZZ6GYVKGQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-visit-brazil-argentina-meetings-with-lula-miles-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
UK, US and Canada 'deeply concerned' about foreign information manipulationBritain, the United States and Canada remain "deeply concerned" about foreign information manipulation and other actions aimed at undermining democracies and human rights globally, the three Western countries said in a joint statement. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 14:16:37 GMT VQQZMRPI5ZLCFI3OY2GJAJECMA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk-us-canada-deeply-concerned-about-foreign-information-manipulation-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Ghana lawmaker says jailing LGBT offenders would encourage sodomy in prisonA Ghanaian legislator has asked parliament to replace jail terms for gay sex with non-custodial sentences including counselling, saying the anti-LGBT bill currently making its way through the legislature would only encourage sodomy in prisons. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 14:13:53 GMT WZFW3F2OFVODRK7JIMSX2LPZ5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ghana-lawmaker-says-jailing-lgbt-offenders-would-encourage-sodomy-prison-2024-02-16/Maxwell Adombila世界非洲
Kyiv says Russia has fired at least 24 North Korean ballistic missiles at UkraineRussia has fired at least 24 North Korean ballistic missiles at Ukraine since Dec. 30, in strikes that have largely appeared inaccurate and killed at least 14 civilians, Ukraine said on Friday in a preliminary assessment. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 14:05:49 GMT X243HTH7GZMVXLB7XJVU6QV5LA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kyiv-says- Russia-has-fired-ateast-24-north-korean-ballistic-missiles-in-ukraine-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Alexei Navalny, Russian opposition politician and Putin nemesisAlexei Navalny, reported to have died on Friday by Russia's prison service, was the fiercest domestic opponent of Vladimir Putin, whom he accused of trying to kill him and of having him jailed on bogus charges and deprived of medical care. He was 47. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 14:04:51 GMT AJJZ57KZSBJHNIFYMC7GZGCQBY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/obituary-alexei-navalny- Russian-opposition-politician-putin-nemesis-reported-2024-02-16/Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
Palestinians fear displacement as Egypt said to make contingency planFor Palestinians forced from their homes by Israel's Gaza offensive, reports that Egypt is bracing for the possibility of a Palestinian exodus have only hardened their fears of being driven off the land entirely. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 13:59:04 GMT MVN2UQUGPJLFJEKPCE64GD6UJE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-fear-displacement-egypt-says-make-contingency-plan-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东地区
VP Harris says US working to confirm Navalny death, sign of Putin's brutalityVice President Kamala Harris said the United States is working to confirm the death of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, adding that it would be a further sign of Russian President Vladimir Putin's brutality. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 13:51:31 GMT F4GVN3GX6NIJJLQQQ4TVZAPD6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/vp-harris-says-us-working-confirm-navalny-death-sign-putins-brutality-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Explainer: What is happening in Senegal and could tensions escalate?The postponement of Senegal's presidential election from Feb. 25 to Dec. 15 has been ruled unconstitutional and the authorities are under pressure to schedule the vote to be held as soon as possible before President Macky Sall's term ends on April 2. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 13:42:47 GMT LRT2C5E7ARMR3HCGHR3HQHCQ5M https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/what-is-happening-senegal-could-tensions-escalate-2024-02-16/Reuters世界非洲
US peacekeepers ready to prevent violence in north Kosovo, commander saysU.S. peacekeeping troops in Kosovo are well equipped and stand ready to prevent violence in the country's ethnically divided north, often the scene of armed clashes in which most recently a policeman was killed, a commander told Reuters. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 13:14:45 GMT ROOD3765MFMSXEEPSIS3AZ7IIU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-peacekeepers-ready-to-prevent-violence-north-kosovo-commander-says-2024-02-16/Fatos Bytyci世界
